item.description:
Chart new waters by exploring the Boston Harbor at our Open House event. Come join us on a FREE sailing tour of Boston and discover a different side of the city. Every boat is skippered by an experienced sailor for you to relax and enjoy the scenery or take a turn on the helm.

Learn more about our Learn To Sail program, year-round sailing memberships, corporate charters, and event space. For the adventurous folks, we will be offering a$100 discount on our Learn To Sail program at the event that should not be passed up along with other various offers. We look forward to meeting you!

For more information about the event, go to http://www.bostonsailingcenter.com/news/OpenHouseFAQ.asp.
item.name: Free Sailing- Boston Sailing Center Open House
